title: Existing POS, with encumbered structures shall be cleared of the encumbrances and shall be maintained entirely for the intended purpose only and cannot be developed under any redevelopment scheme
clause_text: Existing POS, with encumbered structures shall be cleared of the encumbrances and shall be maintained entirely for the intended purpose only and cannot be developed under any redevelopment scheme. Existing Play Ground attached to Educational and Medical

source_pdf.text_snippet: Existing POS, with encumbered structures shall be cleared of the encumbrances and shall be maintained entirely for the intended purpose only and cannot be developed under any redevelopment scheme.
